input: Any object that symbolically resembles a penis may also be referred to as a phallus , or as being " phallic " ( as in ' phallic symbol ' ) .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: White supremacy is the belief that white people are better than other races .
output: White supremacy or white supremacism is the racist belief that white people are superior to people of other races and therefore should be dominant over them .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: Only hybrid cats that are chocolate , sable , lavender , lilac , or a Siamese pattern are not allowed in cat shows .
output: Generally , only cats showing evidence of crossbreeding resulting in the colors chocolate , sable , lavender , lilac , or the point-restricted pattern of the Siamese family are disqualified from being shown .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: Substance abuse , or drug abuse , happens when a person uses a drug over and over again , in ways that hurt their health .
output: Substance abuse , also known as drug abuse , is a patterned use of a drug in which the user consumes the substance in amounts or with methods which are harmful to themselves or others , and is a form of substance-related disorder .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: Trinity Hall is one of the colleges of the University of Cambridge , England .
output: Trinity Hall ( formally The College or Hall of the Holy Trinity in the University of Cambridge ) is a constituent college of the University of Cambridge , England .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: In taxonomy , the Haloarchaea are a class of the Euryarchaeota , found in water with salt .
output: Haloarchaea ( halophilic archaea , halophilic archaebacteria , halobacteria ) are a class of the Euryarchaeota , found in water saturated or nearly saturated with salt .

instruction: In this task, we ask you to elaborate the sentence without changing its general meaning. You can do so by explaining further the input sentence, using more precise wording, adding qualifiers and auxiliary information etc.
input: The Prime Minister of Italy , officially President of the Council of Ministers , is the head of government of Italy .
output: The President of the Council of Ministers of the Italian Republic ( Italian : " Presidente del Consiglio dei ministri della Repubblica Italiana " ) , commonly referred to in Italy as Presidente del Consiglio , or informally as Premier and known in English as the Prime Minister of Italy , is the head of government of the Italian Republic .
